amendment.description: An amendment to provide that none of the funds in the bill may be expended in violation of laws relating to discontinuing granting visas to nationals of countries denying or delaying accepting aliens removed from the U.S.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to provide that none of the funds in the bill may be expended in violation of laws relating to discontinuing granting visas to nationals of countries denying or delaying accepting aliens removed from the U.S.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Tancredo amendment (A024) Agreed to by voice vote.
